item.description:
Copley Square Park - WBOS Series

Thursday 26th July

5:30pm

FREE

Address:
Copley Square Park
Between Boylston St & St. James Ave
Boston, MA

The Plan: Lets meet on the steps of the Boston public library on Dartmouth St at 5:20 (the website suggests that the concert starts at 5:30, not 5:00). This is directly across the road from the park, and around the corner from the Copley T Stop. Obviously we'll move on from there at to see the show, if you are late ring me on 617 312 2236.

More info:
http://wbos.com/WBOSC...

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Live Aussie music: Cat Empire
